name: Kumari Mullin

jv_history.source_quote: empower teachers, healers, leaders, enlightened entrepreneurs how to unwrap their spiritual, healing, and intuitive gifts. Hosting new TV show "Bliss" on Divine Spirit Network Hosted "Co-Creation ...

what_you_do: Kumari Mullin is an internationally acclaimed spiritual teacher, intuitive coach, Reiki Master and best-selling author who empowers people to unwrap their intuitive, healing, manifesting and spiritual gifts.
who_you_serve: Kumari serves individuals seeking to heal, manifest and awaken their divine potential.
social_proof: Kumari has facilitated thousands of people and their beloved animals to achieve profound transformations. She is the host of an upcoming TV show 'BLISS' on the Divine Spirit Network and has hosted 'Co-Creation Activations' on World Puja Network.
signature_programs: Kumari offers transformational courses on energy healing, intuitive and spiritual development, and manifesting. Her products include 'Awaken Your Soul - Energy Alchemy Level 1', 'Awaken Your Soul - Energy Alchemy Level 2', '33 Day Chant for Prosperity', and various crystal products.
niche: energy healing, intuitive development, spiritual awakening
business_focus: Empowering individuals to heal, manifest and awaken their divine potential through energy healing, intuitive development and spiritual teachings.
service_provided: Energy healing, intuitive coaching, spiritual development courses, manifesting programs, Reiki training
